# vertex-scene-tree-toolbar-group

The `<vertex-scene-tree-toolbar-group>` is a component that will horizontally
layout children. Spacing is added between each child.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot                          | Description |
| ----------------------------- | ----------- |
| `"The content of the group."` |             |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                       | Description                                                   |
| -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--scene-tree-toolbar-gap` | A CSS length that specifies the horizontal gap between slots. |
